text: Architectural style is the style of structures, such as buildings and bridges. One of the oldest groups to build most things in the same style were the Ancient Greeks between the 7th and 4th centuries BC. They built in the classical style. Some architectural styles include: * Arts and Crafts Architecture * Art Deco Architecture * Baroque architecture * Beaux-Arts Architecture * Bauhaus Architecture * Byzantine Architecture * Cape Cod Architecture * Classical Architecture * Gothic Architecture * Greek-revival * Italianate Architecture * Neoclassical Architecture * Renaissance architecture * Roman Architecture * Tudor style architecture * Ultramodern architecture * Victorian Architecture ==References== Category:Architecture
title: Architectural style
